com.qtfx.lib.db

Class FieldGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.db.FieldGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<FieldGroup>

    public class FieldGroup
extends Object
implements Comparable<FieldGroup>
    A group of fields within a table or view. Domains of the same group are expected to same a related meaning.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
